snippet: Shorter waiting times were reported in northern New Jersey after an odd-and-even rationing system took effect, but many gas stations were closed.
abstract: Shorter waiting times for gasoline are reported in northern New Jersey after an odd-and-even rationing system takes effect, but many gas stations remain closed in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Shorter waiting times were reported in northern New Jersey after an odd-and-even rationing system took effect, but many gas stations were closed.

headline.seo: Gas Lines Ease but Shortages Persist in N.Y. Region
headline.main: Gas Lines Ease, but Shortages and Closed Stations Persist Across New York Region
headline.print_headline: Gas Lines Ease, but Shortages and Closed Stations Persist Across New York Region
